subject: Pedal Plate
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,

I received my Plus X pedals today - thank you for the fast delivery!
However, I realized that the order I placed did not include a baseplate. I
now understand that this was my mistake.

I did notice, though, that it would have been cheaper to order the pedals
with a baseplate included rather than buying the baseplate separately. I
was wondering if you might be able to offer me a special deal on the
baseplate given this situation.

I really appreciate your help and look forward to your response.

Thank you very much,
Jenson

conversations.body_text: Hi jenson bade,    Because shipping the baseplate separately incurs similarly high shipping costs. And our shipping fees are largely included within the product sale price, so purchasing it separately would be more expensive.   You may use this free shipping discount code to place your order: FS99

Ok, thank you.

On Mon, Sep 8, 2025 at 4:00 PM service@simsonn.com
